attributes.action: bring in legislation whitch reduces the luxury of being on the doal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousand of people in the UK claim Doal and Job-seekers allowance. This petition is to make the doal seem less luxury. 

The idea is that people on the doal should be made to do tasks which better their community before they can claim.

People should use the doal as a last resort, ie. when made redundant or fired. Too often our hard earned 'tax payers' money is spent on paying for people who are too lazy to work.

Sign this petition to help make the doal a less desirable place to be.
